2020.title: Dark Souls Remastered
likes: The best world building
Solaire is a top-tier lad
dislikes: Lighting often looks worse to the original
Colour palette has been dulled

2020.title: Demon's Souls (2009)
likes: Incredible atmosphere
Heavily influenced future game design from other developers
dislikes: Somethings are unecessarily obtuse
No more online servers but can use custom ones

2020.title: Wonderful 101 Remastered
likes: Kamiya is one of my favourite directors and this is a mash-up of his best work
Wonder-Red is an excellent protagonist and deserves to be in Smash
dislikes: Tutorial systems not the best
Remastered version seemed buggier than the original

2020.title: Dead Space
likes: Great blend of the action and horror genres
Excellent sound and UI design
dislikes: Turret sections
A lot of similar looking corridors

2020.title: Divinity Original Sin 2
likes: The elemental effects make for an exciting flashy combat system
Rivellon is an incredible theme for the massive jolly sandbox that is Act 2
dislikes: Armor split between physical/magical meant it's objectively worse to have a split damage type team
Managing loot between all party members is time consuming

2020.title: Final Fantasy IX
likes: Really good character designs
Some of the best towns in RPGs
dislikes: Combat can be incredibly slow
Character party members are split up constantly

2020.title: Grim Dawn
likes: Dual Class system makes for a ridiculous level of build variety
Deep modding scene lets you play through new adventures
dislikes: Animations aren't the best due to
So much gear it can be hard to make yourself a decent build

2020.title: Hades
likes: An actual roguelike with a story that evolves on multiple runs
Great attention to detail on Greek Mythology
dislikes: Some runs can be a bit boring
Takes an unecessary amount of successful runs to max out the difficulty

2020.title: Half-Life 1
likes: Source Engine still being maintained today means it runs very well
Great NPC chatter
dislikes: The final levels are a bit boring structurally
Sometimes AI can feel unfair

2020.title: Monster Hunter World: Iceborne
likes: New environment is gorgeous
Charge Blade got even better
dislikes: The claw sucks
Master Rank monsters have a bit too much health

2020.title: Nioh 2
likes: Bosses are a delightful fight compared to Nioh 1
Switchglaive is swag and belongs in Bloodborne
dislikes: Lacks the ambition you would want to see in a sequel
Levels still have many caves

2020.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
likes: Every area is as beautiful as a painting
I adore Arthur Morgan and think he's Rockstars best protagonist
dislikes: Mission format is repetive and some feel uneccessary
Epilogue can stretch and relies on you to have played RDR1 to feel meaningful

2020.title: Sekiro
likes: MY NAME IS GYOUBU MASATAKA ONIWA
Some environments and fights are a spectacle
dislikes: The danger symbol can often just get in the way of seeing animations
Underwater combat

2020.title: Wasteland 3
likes: Character stats play an important part right from the beginning
Wonderful covers of old songs that suit the games tone
dislikes: Multiplayer was buggy with many disconnects resulting in lost progress
Not a lot of party member interactions

2020.title: Xenoblade X
likes: The best open world in a video game in terms of diversity and scale
Adam 'I'm really feeling it' Howden returns as a voice actor
dislikes: The new LA night theme really sucks
Switching party members is cumbersome as it's based on realism rather than a simple menu

2020.title: A Short Hike
likes: A really sweet main character, that is also a bird
Overall a really positive feeling game
dislikes: World size feels massive even before getting meaningful upgrades
The ability to climb seems odd for a bird protagonist

2020.title: Ace Combat 7
likes: Incredible sound design and soundtrack
Mihaly Dumitru Margareta Corneliu Leopold Blanca Karol Aeon Ignatius Raphael Maria Niketas A. Shilage
dislikes: Cutscenes are primarily still images, including the infamous dog.jpg
Never really get a look at your fellow comrades, seemed low budget

2020.title: Dreams
likes: Media Molecule did a good job on making game development accessible
The main campaign was a short delight with whimsical charm
dislikes: Games can take too long to make resulting in burn out and lack of levels
Alex Evans has left the studio now. Which sucks. I hope MM survive

2020.title: Final Fantasy VI
likes: Cyan is one of the best FF protagonist
2 world maps was ambitious
dislikes: 13+ playable characters makes experimenting team composition tiresome
That mage tower of cultists was one infuriating dungeon

2020.title: Halo 1
likes: Clever control scheme that changes FPS on consoles
Skybox of the Halo lets the imagination run wild
dislikes: Many levels have repeated environments and feels dragged on
The flood

2020.title: Hellblade
likes: A haunting headphone experience
Wonderful idea to base a game so rooted into mental health
dislikes: Combat being too easy makes the ending lack impact
The facial capture often looked comical

2020.title: Persona 5 (Royal)
likes: New antagonist's motives are a worthy cause and make him admirable
New combat theme doesn't disappoint
dislikes: Doesn't fix the absurd story events around Futaba
Combat has gotten even easier due to new social options

2020.title: Super Mario 3D Land
likes: Short sweet levels mean the gimmick doesn't start to bore
8 new worlds in the post-game with just as many good levels
dislikes: Mario moves at a slow speed but that might be me being accustomed to Mario Odyssey movement
Not very challenging

2020.title: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD
likes: Really nice art style that holds up
The mini-game where the guy yellos SPLOOSH and KABOOM
dislikes: Dungeon designs once again, quite forgettable
Riding in the ocean still kinda blows despite the speed boost
2020.url: img/The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD.jpg

2020.title: Animal Crossing New Horizons
likes: The sassy lookin animal people hyrbrids
Seeing creative people's houses and islands
dislikes: Almost everything, why did I give this a 6, I hate it
Villagers contribute nothing to the island and feels just like a formula check up

2020.title: Dark Souls 2
likes: A lot of build variety and content in general
DLC shows an improvement in level layout
dislikes: Clearly rushed with scrapped ideas not fleshed out
Deadzone on movement and adaptability stat make just walking feel muddy

2020.title: Divinity Original Sin
likes: Rock/Paper/Scissors mechanic for co-op makes a playthrough very interesting
Towns were full of life and fun quests with branching solutions
dislikes: Combat was very RNG based on debuffs
Environmental hazards were plentiful and boring

2020.title: Fifa 20
likes: Liverpool won the league so that's nice, nothing to do with the game
I got Timo Werner or something, and now he plays for Chelsea and sucks
dislikes: That gambling for kids feature
30fps locked unless you change some crap in a file

2020.title: Hyrule Warriors
likes: So much content for a Musou game
Good difficulty curve on hard difficulty
dislikes: Boss fights are repetitive and lack variety
Loot system is unecessary

2020.title: Kirby Star Allies
likes: It's Kirby and he is shaped like a friend
Crazy ending that is absurd even for a Kirby game
dislikes: The gimmick of this game is extremely dull compared to the Robobot
Very plain levels that didn't stand out

2020.title: Metal Wolf Chaos XD
likes: The voice acting is incredibly bad but also charming
Particle effects are crazy
dislikes: Mission objectives until the end are generic military stuff
UI not been updated to accomodate HD remster

2020.title: Pokemon Alpha Sapphire
likes: Being able to freely fly is a neat addition, that once again, is removed in the next one
Gen 3 still has some of the best routes in a Pokemon game
dislikes: Not including features of Emerald from 15 years ago is the dumbest decision
Art style of characters is hideous

2020.title: Resident Evil 7
likes: Sections with the Baker family and their history are fantastic
Really enjoyed the VHS tape implementations
dislikes: First person horror relies too much on camera gimmicks and taking the player out of control
Ship and mine section are so awful

2020.title: Slay the Spire
likes: Quite addictive
Combat can be very fast which is great for a roguelike
dislikes: Art is so inconsistent that it's hard to believe it's from the same world
RPG elements are unecessary

2020.title: Supraland
likes: Really creative puzzle solutions
Music was really peaceful
dislikes: Too many meme references
Some puzzles overstayed their welcome

2020.title: World of Final Fantasy
likes: Some beautiful environments even if the level paths are linear
All the FF games are portrayed with wonderful care
dislikes: Too much menu managaement for a Pokemon clone
Getting the true ending dragged

2020.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
likes: Fantastic camera for a N64 game
Gerudo Valley theme is incredible
dislikes: Dungeon designs, like every Zelda game are still boring
I can't stress how much I hate dungeons in Zelda games
2020.url: img/The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.jpg

2020.title: Dying Light
likes: Parkour and the grappling hook was a fun way to traverse a zombie infested town
Drop-kicking zombies off buildings was a blast
dislikes: Despite the co-op influence, making the ending a single player only level is quite dumb
Durability on weapons

2020.title: Dark Souls 3
likes: Undead Settlement is an excellent starting area but then the game drops hard
Some of the vistas are incredible
dislikes: Not a single original idea to be found throughout the entire game
Poise clearly doesn't work

2020.title: Final Fantasy X
likes: Worldbuilding is unique for a Final Fantasy game and deserves more love
Lulu is a gothic babe
dislikes: The dungeons are so awful I docked 5 points
Blitzball is the worst sport mini-game in a game

2020.title: Metro 2033
likes: Playing with Russian language is a pretty sureal experience as not everything is subtitled
Great AI on some monsters
dislikes: Linear design makes a scary setting seem less scary
Enemy accuracy is ridiculous, even on the easiest difficulty

2020.title: Finding Paradise
likes: Heartwarming story
It didn't cost my wallet too much
dislikes: Ugly art, bad humour
References to anime completely ruins the tone of the game

2020.title: Minecraft Dungeons
likes: It was part of Game Pass
ARPGs is a fun genre to include as a spin-off
dislikes: I honestly can't remember much about this game
Loot was probably underwhelming but I can't remember!

2020.title: Monster Sanctuary
likes: Some monster designs were incredible
Combining metroidvania levels and Pokemon was a neat idea and worked pretty well
dislikes: Monsters were so similar I saw no need to ever change up from a typical set up
A lot of menu management

2020.title: Pokemon X
likes: Pancham, Gogoar and Clawitzer are really good designs
Pokemon is neat
dislikes: Only about 80 new Pokemon but some of the designs were good
Game is over so fast after taking forever to just get 2 badges

2020.title: Titan Quest Anniversary Edition
likes: Unique setting for an ARPG with plenty of unique assets
Classes for an ARPG are also pretty unique
dislikes: Mage classes are awful
Loot is disappointing but mods can fix this

2020.title: Troll and I
likes: Played it as I lost a bet and it's not as bad as everyone says
Ending made me laugh in a way I haven't laughed in years
dislikes: A bug that forced me to redo 75% of the game
Only one save slot is a dumb choice for such a modern (and buggy) game

2020.title: Pokemon Shield
likes: Pokemon designs are a significant step up from Sun/Moon
Wild area was a good concept but poorly executed
dislikes: No dungeons makes the wild area feel so empty and just a wide route
Online raids are clearly implemented to appeal to the Pokemon Go crowd

2020.title: Remnant from the Ashes
likes: Some boss designs were great
It's like Dark Souls but with guns
dislikes: Every area looked the exact same
Healing was slow and everything was a hold button prompt

2020.title: Tokyo Mirage Sessions
likes: Cute fashion for the idols
SMT combat system was implemented well but the Fire Emblem element is nothing
dislikes: Far too long
Towns were disappointing

2020.title: Torchlight 2
likes: Pretty short for an ARPG
Pet system is wonderful and reduces downtime significantly
dislikes: Cooldowns on some skills were 2+ minutes and were lame
Levelling up skills took too long

2020.title: Monster Prom
likes: Received as a joke gift
It's short
dislikes: Egoraptor voices someone
Art is pretty awful

2020.title: Fairy Tail RPG
likes: Character models were good
Nice turn based combat system for an adaptation of a manga
dislikes: Crashes on loading screens
Many things were handled offscreen just to move the plot forward a story arc

2020.title: Earth Defense Force Insect Armageddon
likes: Multiple classes and weapons was fun to switch up
Blowing up buildings was great
dislikes: Not enough variety of insects
It just sucks

2019.title: Sekiro
likes: Swords clashing sound fx
Excellent bosses
dislikes: English dub is bad
Soundtrack doesn't have a wide range

2019.title: Pokemon White
likes: Village Bridge music
151 new Pokemon
dislikes: Bad touch screen UI
Online features now worthless
